titleStmt.title: An itinerary contayning a voyage, made through Italy, in the yeare 1646, and 1647. Illustrated with divers figures of antiquities. Never before published. / By Jo: Raymond, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Raymond, John, Gent.
Cross, Thomas, fl. 1632-1682, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his Shop at the Princes Armes in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, "Il Mercurio Italico communicating a voyage made through Italy ..", signed: T. Cross sculpt.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
With a final errata and imprimatur leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his Shop at the Princes Armes in St. Pauls Church-yard
